backend/main.mo: Main backend canister implementing users, conversations, messages with image blobs, calls, and a friend system using access control and storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old conversations/messages into new versions that include an optional image field.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend source files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling defining OKLCH color tokens and light/dark theme variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app coordinating onboarding, local identity setup, backend registration, and rendering chat UI within providers.
frontend/src/constants/branding.ts: Exports branding constants for the app name and tagline.
frontend/src/features/auth/LoginView.tsx: Deprecated login view showing branding and a notice that it is no longer used.
frontend/src/features/auth/NameStartView: Collects and saves a user display name during onboarding and triggers completion via a callback.
frontend/src/features/calls/CallChip.tsx: Shows a minimized call UI with peer info, mute toggle, and end-call controls.
frontend/src/features/calls/CallProvider: Provides global call state including active call data, mute status, and minimize/restore actions.
frontend/src/features/calls/CallScreen.t: Displays the full call interface, handling video/audio stream setup, mute sync, errors, and minimize/end actions.
frontend/src/features/calls/useLocalMedi: Manages acquiring and releasing local media streams, handling errors, and enabling/disabling audio tracks.
frontend/src/features/chat/ChatShell.tsx: Main chat layout managing conversation selection, dialogs, friend requests, and embedding call UI elements.
frontend/src/features/chat/ConversationL: Renders a scrollable list of conversations with unread state, selection handling, and participant display. Loads conversations and user data, showing placeholders when loading or empty.
frontend/src/features/chat/FriendRequest: Displays pending friend requests in a dialog with accept and decline actions. Fetches requestor profiles and triggers mutations with feedback to the user.
frontend/src/features/chat/MessageCompos: Provides a text and image message composer with validation, upload progress, and send handling. Sends messages via mutation and supports image preview and clearing.
frontend/src/features/chat/MessageThread: Shows messages for a conversation with auto-scroll, read-status updates, and call initiation. Loads user profiles, handles friend requests, and embeds the MessageComposer.
frontend/src/features/chat/NewChatDialog: Searches for users to start new chats, showing friend status and allowing starting conversations or sending friend requests. Filters results and triggers mutations with feedback.
frontend/src/features/chat/time.ts: Provides utilities for formatting timestamps into relative time and message time strings. Converts nanosecond timestamps into readable formats.
frontend/src/features/chat/useMessagePol: Implements polling to periodically refresh messages, conversations, and unread state for an active conversation. Uses react-query to invalidate relevant queries.
frontend/src/features/profile/ChangeDisp: Dialog component allowing users to update their display name using a mutation and invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/features/profile/DisplayNam: Onboarding UI for new users to register a display name and trigger onboarding completion.
frontend/src/features/profile/ProfileMen: Profile dropdown menu showing user info and providing access to the change-display-name dialog.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalActor.ts: Hook that loads or creates a local identity and initializes a backend actor with access control.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for conversations, messages, user search, user fetching, and message-related mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme color variables plus message bubble component styles.
frontend/src/lib/localIdentity.ts: Manages Ed25519 identities including generation, serialization, storage, loading, and clearing from localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/localProfile.ts: Handles display name and onboarding flags in localStorage with getters, setters, and clear functions.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function for merging Tailwind and clsx class names.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for extracting, storing, and persisting URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors tied to CSS variables, extended theme settings, and additional plugins.
project_state.json: Describes project goals, features, issues, and image-generation requirements for the YGLSUP app.
